mapper.select: select count(*), s.siteId, s.campSiteStock, bs.stayDay from bookedsite bs join site s where s.siteId = bs.siteId and stayDay = #{chkIn} group by s.siteId;

select c.campName, s.campSiteName, c.campAddr, c.campPhone, s.dayPrice, s.siteId from camp c join site s where 1=0 or c.campId = s.campId and c.campName like '%${campName}%' or c.campId = s.campId and c.campAddr like '%${campAddr}%' or c.campId = s.campId and s.campPerson like '%${campPerson}%'
or 1=1 and c.campId = s.campId
